# Data

For a starters we use again all dinocyst data but exclusively use temperature at a 30 meter water depth as an outcome variable.

```{r data}
str(dinodat[1:10,1:15])
xc <- dinodat[1:30,1:15]
xc <- pivot_longer(xc, paste0(abbreviate_vars(parms), "_an"), names_to = "parameter")
xc <- rename_with(xc, ~gsub(" ", "_", .x))
```

```{r form}



```



```{r lme}
fm <- as.formula("value ~ Pentapharsodinium_dalei")
nlme::lme(fm, data = xc, random = ~ Pentapharsodinium_dalei|parameter)

```
